content: this legal text discusses the progress of a divorce case between mr vb and his wife the document mentions a prior agreement for an extension of time and states that there are 7 blades involved mr vb who is a notary working for a company called notaris vb is handling the proceedings the text explains that the partners got married under the legal regime of community property and have children together they have also declared their assets debts and agreements in accordance with the judicial code the document outlines the division of their property including personal items movable property financial accounts and vehicles they have also addressed rental agreements consumer credit income taxes and debts the agreement has retroactive effect and includes renouncing certain rights in the event of one spouses death the text also covers arrangements for the children including housing parental authority financial contributions and responsibility for child benefits and taxes it mentions the possibility of wage authorization in case of nonpayment of maintenance and the existence of the maintenance claims service the document explains that a parentcreditor can request advances for maintenance arrears from the federal public service finance it also states that custody arrangements and maintenance can be reviewed by the court in case of new circumstances in a mutual consent divorce neither spouse is required to pay maintenance to the other the costs and fees related to the divorce proceedings are to be shared equally the divorce proceedings will take place in a specific court and the parties can choose a fully written procedure the document becomes binding once the divorce is pronounced and the parties confirm their understanding of their rights and obligations
